description: If your computer crashes or files become corrupt you can restore your QB2016 company file. When QuickBooks backs up your data, it creates a .DMG file that includes a copy of your QB2016 file and Attached Documents Library folder. To restore your QB2016 company file from a backup:
NOTE: Previous versions of QuickBooks for Mac use the extensions .QB2015 , .QB2014 , .QB2013 , etc. These files are known as legacy files in the QuickBooks 2016 release.
